entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • XmlSerializer leaks native memory, leading to OOM. #95369
    8.0.x
  • [outerloop] [NativeAOT] Code generation failed for method System.Linq.Tests.EmptyPartitionTests.SingleInstance() #95367
  • Discrepancies in reported primitive type size #95366
  • [wasi] `System.Globalization.Tests` AOT build fails with `LLVM ERROR: out of memory` on Windows #95365
    9.0.0
  • Strange 'BinarySearch' behavior with some special unicode characters #95363
  • [Analyzer]: Flagging unexpected `UnsafeAccessorAttribute` usage #95361
    Future
  • Consider changing BBJ_CALLFINALLY/BBJ_ALWAYS representation of call to finally #95355
    9.0.0
  • TarWriter writes badly formatted size field for a zero sized regular file #95354
  • [QUIC][H/3] Improve perfomance #95351
    9.0.0
  • [mono] Release mode - Null check then tostring works differently #95347
  • Performance regression of System.MemoryExtensions.SequenceEqual measured on .NET 8.0 Intel Core i7-7700HQ #95346
  • Improve UX for publishing existing project as wasi #95345
    9.0.0
  • System.Net.Http.StreamContent.ReadAsStreamAsync() doesn't reset to stream to initial position #95344
  • [wasm] Test timing out - `DebuggerTests.BreakpointTests.CreateGoodBreakpointAndHitGoToWasmPageWithoutAssetsComeBackAndHitAgain` #95343
  • httpclient need proxy for each request #95342
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization investigate behavioural changes in string comparison #95338
    9.0.0
  • DateTime.Parse exception missing input value in .NET 8 #95331
    8.0.x
  • Fatal error instead of calling Unhandled Exception Filter #95330
  • SequenceReader doesn't have endian aware type-spec'd read methods for unsigned or single / double types #95320
  • JIT: Loop cloning when the method has GDV skips necessary validity checks #95315
    9.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Collections #95349

Closed

  • InMemoryDirectoryInfo is unexpectedly dependent on working directory due to its use of GetFullPath. #50648
    9.0.0
  • Failing test -`System.IO.Tests.File_GetSetTimes_SafeFileHandle_Pathless.WritingShouldUpdateWriteTime_After_SetLastAccessTime` on windows/x86 #95298
    9.0.0
  • Analyzer should warn when using [UnsafeAccessor] with a local function #91740
    Future
  • Assertion failed '!"Missing flags on tree"' #95042
    9.0.0
  • ImmutableHashSet.Contains is annotated to disallow nulls, while explicitly coded to support nulls #95360
  • Microsoft.DiaSymReader.Native.amd64.dll version downgraded in 7.0.12 service pack #93458
  • [wasi] Single file build fails with AOT #95273
  • [wasm] Changing DllImport does not result in a new wasm module #95192
    9.0.0
  • Autogenerated assembly version is set to false for ILLink #78076
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed '!"Unexpected small type in IR"' #95318
    9.0.0
  • Arm64: Casting a specific double value to uint32 caused an unexpected divide by zero to occur #95290
  • Passing generic class with nullable reference type in JsonSerializableAttribute raises CS8620 when used #95083
    9.0.0
  • Optimize allocations of a capturing lambda in `GetRuntimeNativeAssets` #87911
    Future
  • .NET 8.0 RC1 and RC2 lag spikes #93341
  • Http/3 performs a lot worse than Http/1.1 or Http/2. What could be wrong? #95104
    Future
  • Microsoft.NET.ILLink has not had a non-preview release #95126
  • [API Proposal]: Vector256.ReplaceElementAt<T>(Int32 index, Vector256<T> vector, T newValue) Method #95316
  • System.Net.IPNetwork - not working #95321
  • [API Proposal]: add `JsonSerializerOptions.Web` for `JsonSerializerOptions` #92181
    9.0.0
  • JsonConverter for {ReadOnly}Memory doesn't deserialize nulls #95267
    9.0.0
  • DirectPInvoke with compile time platform check #95319
  • JIT: Incorrect removal of bounds check in some loop structures #95226
    9.0.0
  • .NET 8 Blazor Lazy loading failed with assembly naming like "requests.wasm" #95169
    8.0.x
  • mono debug component not able to re-connect after disconnect #95256
    8.0.x
  • Unable to test project targeting net8.0-windows and win-x64 #95305

PullRequests

Created

  • [browser][MT] JSImport dispatch to target thread via JSSynchronizationContext #95370
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] CI: trigger only WBT on template changes #95368
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, needs-area-label
  • [release/8.0-staging] Correct time zone name creation when generated lazily. #95364
    Servicing-consider, area-System.DateTime, 8.0.x
  • Free the tls memory on thread termination #95362
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Revert "Pin the Alpine Arm32 image to previous tag (#94683)" #95359
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix FormatException message argument #95356
    area-System.DateTime, 8.0.x
  • Clean up GT_NOP #95353
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add regression testing for the STJv8 source generator. #95352
    area-System.Text.Json, test-enhancement, 9.0.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #95350
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: Enable jump-to-next removal optimization for non-debug code #95340
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable System.Net.Quic.Tests.MsQuicTests.ByteMixingOrNativeAVE_MinimalFailingTest on WinSrv2022 #95339
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Add Arm64 encodings for IF_SVE_AF_3A to IF_SVE_AQ_3A #95337
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable CertificateValidationClientServer_EndToEnd_Ok in Windows NativeAoT #95333
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [RISC-V] Add support for fcvt.w instructions to CodeGen::genIntToFloatCast #95327
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Port loop cloning to the new loop representation #95326
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Add JSON null support for the built-in (ReadOnly)Memory converters. #95325
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.x
  • [browser] Added an optional HybridGlobalization run of libraries #95324
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-browser
  • [RISC-V] Replace rsGetRsvdReg with ordinary temp registers #95317
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Fixes for Bionic on x64 #95313
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Determine cross based on OS in addition to arch #95312
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix performance of System.Security. Cryptography.Tests #95310
    area-System.Security, test-enhancement
  • Split out a `TestContext` class from `RepoDirectoriesProvider` #95309
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • Make GetKeyedServices(KeyedService.AnyKey) return all services #95308
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Convert HELPER_METHOD_FRAME to QCalls (3/N) #95306
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add PropertyBuilder implementation #95303
    area-System.Reflection.Emit

Merged

  • [wasi] wasiconsole: Update template to target net9.0 #95358
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Combine rootDir with relative file names #94528
    breaking-change, area-Extensions-FileSystem, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 9.0.0
  • make WritingShouldUpdateWriteTime_After_SetLastAccessTime more resilient #95336
    area-System.IO, test-enhancement, 9.0.0
  • Correct time zone name creation when generated lazily. #95304
    area-System.DateTime, 9.0.0
  • Add memory randomization runs #95291
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • JIT: enable cross-block local assertion prop #94689
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove BBJ_NONE #94239
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasi] Fix incremental, and aot/single-file builds #95307
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • JIT: Remove questionable transformation #95249
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make source generated JsonTypeInfo properties nullable-oblivious #95341
    area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • Optimize capturing lambdas in `DependencyContextExtensions` and `DependencyContextJsonReader` #92462
    area-DependencyModel, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] Downgrade ServicingVersion for Microsoft.Extensions.Options to 1 #95348
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Options, 8.0.1
  • [wasi] CI: Add AOT library tests job #95146
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Honor virtual memory limit #80295
    area-GC-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Remove unused GT_CLS_VAR_ADDR #95323
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Trimming: Add tests for handling of annotated string type names representing generic instantiations #95143
    area-Tools-ILLink, 9.0.0
  • `JsonSerializerOptions.Web` for `JsonSerializerOptions` #94370
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Add JSON null support for the built-in (ReadOnly)Memory converters. #95275
    area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Implement some of the NYI methods in unwindriscv64 #95128
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • JIT: Factor SSA's DFS and profile synthesis's loop finding #95251
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Bump PackageVersionNet8 in Versions.props to 8.0 release #95314
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update ILLink.Tasks.csproj #95272
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: Disallow loop increments in the top block #95227
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][debugger] If debugger is disconnected but vm is not exited restart the debugger thread #95266
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Convert HELPER_METHOD_FRAME to QCalls (2/N) #95233
    area-Interop-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix OuterLoop attribute handling #95300
    area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0

Updated

  • Upgrade superpmi benchmarks to 9.0 #95372
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] js string marshaling by value #95180
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [mono][wasm] Use [UnmanagedCallersOnly] in GetDelegateForFunctionPoin… #89334
    area-Interop-mono, 9.0.0
  • Allow specifying IndentText when writing JSON #95292
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add EventSource event for WaitHandle waits #94737
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Remove FindTypeDef api where appropriate. #95297
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Alternative fix for RuntimeHelpers.GetSubArray AOT compatibility warning #95296
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Improve the hashtable for EEClassHash #94825
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add XUnitLogChecker to log libraries dumps, do not enable for NativeAOT tests #94868
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization implement GetSortKey on hybrid mode #95260
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Enable EVEX feature: Embedded Rounding for Avx512F.Add() #94684
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Additional QuicConnectionOptions #94211
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • [browser][MT] JSImport dispatch to target thread via emscripten #94855
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Generalize check for full interruptibility #95299
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Unify parsing part of BigInteger with CoreLib #85978
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Use managed ntlm on linux-bionic #95274
    area-System.Net.Security, needs-author-action
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization use system ICU #93220
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • [release/8.0-staging] Catch exception when subscribing to NetworkChange #95123
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.x
  • Implement straightforward ServicePoint(Manager) properties in HttpWebRequest #94664
    area-System.Net
  • Set version in ZIP local header to ZIP64, when the file offset is >4GB #94970
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix ILLink/ILC hang when tracking too many hoisted local values #95302
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [wasi] Add AOT option to existing Wasi.Build.Tests #95281
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono, os-wasi
  • Add new Pipeline for Running Libs Tests with TestReadyToRun #91229
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • Create a managed implementation of assembly binder #91400
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: CngProperty constructor with ReadOnlySpan<byte> overload #93805
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Implement Interlocked for small types. #92974
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add generic overloads to TensorPrimitives #94555
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-28
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Exception handling: outstanding tasks #2169

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Do not use funclets for faults #2443

Merged

  • [Async-2] Fix resumption stub target in the presence of backpatching #2428
    area-async
  • Add Native AOT for Android experiment #2439
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [APICompat] CP0004 arguments are swapped #37199
  • Winget isn't listing .NET 8 for me #37201

Closed

  • Please make sure that your project file and project.assets.json file are in sync by running restore #37193
  • Add MusicStore app as an automated test to cover (majority of) E2E scenarios #5552
    Backlog
  • Build Product and Tests for Arm64 #5379
    Backlog
  • TFM of win8 or wpa81 does not include all reference assemblies in framework #5309
    Backlog
  • Pacman package for Arch based distros #5543
    Backlog
  • Windows installer should block on < Win7 #5176
    Backlog
  • Manpages in SDK Deb Package Conflict with One Another #5548
    Backlog
  • How to build this repo from scratch on Banana Unix? #5171
    Backlog
  • CLI tools help md files should be more discoverable #5076
    Backlog
  • Add dotnet-env command #4951
    Backlog
  • Bash completion for `dotnet` #4674
    Backlog
  • Homebrew formula #4600
    Backlog
  • Command.Create should not transitively depend on hard coded paths #4592
    Backlog
  • Need a way to specify RID-specific dependencies #4552
    Backlog
  • Fatal error. System.AccessViolationException: Attempted to read or write protected memory. This is often an indication that other memory is corrupt. #37169
  • Product Version Incorrect as of .NET 8 and VS 17.8 #37173
  • [NETSDKE2E][ARM64] With .NET 9 Preview SDK installed, installing wasm-tools workload or maui workload option failed with error. #37035
  • Provide an option to prevent trim from removing unused constructors #36835
  • Debug build of net-ios app works with .NET 7 but fails with .NET 8 #37180

PullRequests

Created

  • Move `src/Tests` to `test` #37200
    untriaged, Area-dotnet new
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #37196
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Added test for .user file in outer build #37192
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Parse -d command differently based on position #37091
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Ensure we deploy all Roslyn binaries into the MSBuildWorkspace BuildHosts #37113
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • parse auth scheme case-insensitively #37165
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • [release/8.0.2xx] [Blazor] Replace `webapp,razor` with `blazor` on `dotnet new` #37176
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Blazor] Replace `webapp,razor` with `blazor` on `dotnet new` #36657
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Fix incorrect app host used in build when PublishSingleFile=true #37114
    area-Single-File, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2325107 #36923
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bump dockercredsprovider to pick up a bugfix #36707
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add custom props imports around DB.props import Fixes #36749 #36777
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Workload history 3 #36809
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Create dummy AfterSdkPublish target Fixes #26710 #36850
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • [Issue #33697] New standalone `info` command #36943
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • wrap and handle cancellation exceptions in .NET Task #37055
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Containers support was moved higher to enable creating image of CLI apps #37072
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK, Area-Containers
  • Also exempt RuntimeIdentifiers Fixes #35575 #36848
    Area-External, untriaged
  • Disable Source Link in desktop WPF temp projects #37164
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use .NET 9.0 versions for task dependencies #37013
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Issue #35173] `--verbosity quiet` suppress success message #36505
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Let runtime supply the portable RID graph #36807
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-28
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Champion "User-defined Positional Patterns" #1047
    Backlog
  • [Proposal]: Implicit parameters #6300
    Backlog
  • [API proposal] Attribute for passing caller identity implicitly #4984
    Needs More Work
  • Collection expression loophole: ability to invoke .Add() method with the parameter type not matching the collection expression element type #7724
  • Champion: Name lookup for simple name when target type known #2926
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: BinaryCompatOnlyAttribute #7706

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • C# code with lambda in an array causes severl errors in refactoring code provider + diag analysis #71002
    17.9
  • 'Use collection expressions' should not disappear if the target element type contains a mismatching tuple element name #70998
  • Offer 'use collection expressions' even in locations that change semantics #70996
  • Flaky test SearchGraphQueryTests_NavigateTo.SearchForMember #70994
  • Publish symbols for MSBuildHost #70987
    17.9
  • `[ImmutableObjectAttribute(...)]` causes NullReferenceException in CSharpUseCollectionExpressionForFluentDiagnosticAnalyzer #70981

Closed

  • C# code with lambda in an array causes severl errors in refactoring code provider + diag analysis #71001
  • Feature 'Semantic classification' is currently unavailable due to an internal error #67442
    17.6
  • Some errors should not fail delegate conversion #66060
    17.9
  • Confusing range for nullability warning on extension method with inferred generic type (CS8620) #70976
  • .NET 6: Switch Expression Produces Redundant Code in IL #70889
  • False positive in Nullability analysis within OR conditional #70962
  • Can't emit source generated code files #70947
  • The default parameter value for struct and record struct is ignored when a new instance is created #70892

PullRequests

Created

  • Add ExternalAccess.EditorConfigGenerator to visx manifest #71003
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Avoid invalid cast exception in BindImplicitConstructorInitializer for top level statements with non-object base type. #71000
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Simple Programs, untriaged
  • Mark two more error codes as build-only #70999
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Handle hoisted exception temps during closure rewriting #70997
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Skip flaky test SearchGraphQueryTests_NavigateTo.SearchForMember #70995
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use new lazily initialized value type in projectinfo #70993
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Make sure completion don't trigger source generator #70985
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use CPS for tests where saving documents needs to be reliable #70983
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: align ConversionsBase.GetCollectionExpressionTypeKind() with spec #70975
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Ensure no torn writes when reading/initializing our solution checksums #70991
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.9 to main #70992
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Ensure no torn writes when reading/initializing our solution checksums #70984
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix code definition window NFW in typescript #70979
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.9 to main #70989
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to release/dev17.9 #70988
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to release/dev17.9 #70813
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Ship release/dev17.9 to main till VS snaps #70986
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Log solution state on test failure #70961
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Move to .NET 8 RTM #70846
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Exclude more errors from those that fail delegate conversion #70965
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Update publishdata for 17.9.P2 snap #70978
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.9 to main #70980
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Snap 17.9 preview 2 #70977
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.9 to main #71004
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Automatically detect missing NuGet packages and restore #70851
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Avoid redundant `HasValue` call in lifted custom binary operator #70934
    Area-Compilers, Code Gen Quality, untriaged
  • Avoid cycle in tuple explicit interface implementation #70694
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Improve codegen for concatenation of `string` and `char` #70971
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.9
  • Add GetSemanticModel method with disableNullableAnalysis flag #70912
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Support implicit indexer access in object initializers #70649
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Range, untriaged
  • EnC: Defer lambda rude edit reporting to runtime #70418
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Support XAML LSP in VS Code #70170
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Unnecessary directives #70251
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Generate async methods #70941
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Optimize nullable value type constant comparison codegen #68069
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Emit `readonly.` for constrained array access #70949
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Make ManagedToolTask.PathToManagedTool virtual #69958
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Backlog
  • Cache the delegate from non-capturing local functions #69801
    Area-Compilers, Community, Backlog
  • Avoid calling GetMembersUnordered for substituted types #70003
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Backlog
  • added preproc for Core specific RCC download paths #70974
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Create a Razor language server cohosted in Roslyn #70819
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • AOT Native DLL with exported function name of "free" fails when using HttpClient #52436
  • [Blazor] Unnecessary Html comments in the script tag #52435
  • [Blazor] Supplying a `null` parameter value to an interactive root component causes a `NullReferenceException` on enhanced navigation #52434
  • Shadow copies fails to gracefully handle deleted folders between publishes #52433
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Google doesn't work out of the box with swagger UI #52432
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile, basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #52431
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes_dapper, json #52430
  • Flaky test InjectedStartup_DefaultApplicationNameIsEntryAssembly #52429
  • False warning for attribute routes when using route tokens #52427
  • ASP.NET Core 8 Identity register Endpoints issue with SQLite Provider EF Core #52426
  • ProblemHttpResult doesn't show in generated OpenApi document #52424
  • CSS nesting does not work fully in isolated CSS files #52422
    Backlog
  • Static file and routing with asterisk template conflict #52420
  • OutputCache configuration - policy validation #52419
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps #52418
  • Error loading blazor webassembly application with modified base path and using a reverse proxy #52417
    Planning: WebUI
  • which authentication shceme is used to authenticate the current request #52415
  • Support Latest ProblemDetails RFC (July 2023, RFC 9457) #52414
  • FocusOnNavigate does not work (dotnet8 - BlazorWebApp) #52412
    Planning: WebUI

Closed

  • Blazor.platform.readStringField not working anymore after dotnet 7.0 upgrade #45274
  • Perf improvement: mvc #52386
  • Removal of index.html in .net 8 needs a migration tip for apache servers #52409
    Planning: WebUI
  • Including Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebAssembly.DevServer 8.0.0 breaks WebAPI debugging #52413
  • Blazor enhanced form handling doesn't honor button formenctype attribute #52019
    8.0.x
  • Blazor enhanced form handling doesn't honor enctype form attribute #52018
    8.0.x
  • Blazor enhanced form using wrong default enctype #52024
    8.0.x
  • authentication blazor web app #52421
  • [Blazor] Replace `webapp,razor` with `blazor` on `dotnet new` #51774
    8.0.x
  • Add Account/AccessDenied endpoint to blazor web template #52167
    8.0.1
  • BWA project template: "@" on @render-mode values and `.Client` project assembly discovery #52084
    8.0.1

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Javax.Net.Ssl.SSLHandshakeException: #19092
  • Disabling RefreshView disables the keyboard #19091
  • SecureStorage on Android: Request StrongBox Backed when building MasterKey for EncryptedSharedPreferences #19090
  • ListView Template with Group Headers Shows Wrong Data on Reuse after Scroll #19089
  • vs2022 .net8.0 mauiAPP can't run #19084
  • [iOS] RadioButton text related properties not working #19081
    Backlog
  • [Bug] Space in Common Class Project triggers some issue while MAUI Class Library is refer on it #19080
  • [Android] Default `CornerRadius` is being converted `ToPixels` twice on `Button` #19077
    Backlog
  • XAML Hot Reload not working for Brush type property in custom controls #19075
    Backlog
  • Shell's back behavior using GoToAsync("..") triggers no page transition for first detail page on iOS #19074
    Backlog
  • [UITEST] Investigate a way to reset the app under test for each test run with Appium #19073
    Backlog
  • [Android] Entry and KeyPress event on Enter key (hardware keyboard) #19072
    Backlog
  • Cannot open First Flyout Item on iOS devices once again #19071
    Backlog
  • Setting Shell.FlyoutWidth in code-behind on Windows throws ArgumentOutOfRangeException #19068
    Backlog

Closed

  • StringContent has no constructors defined #18610
  • CollectionView items height is all over the place when scrolling on iOS (.Net 8 + MAUI workload 8.0.0-rc.1.9171/8.0.100-rc.1) #17890
    .NET 8 SR1
  • How do we use Microsoft.Maui.Controls.WebView in the mobile application that wants to launch multiple browser tabs? #17063
  • [Android] Null check then tostring works differently #19082
  • anggi #19078
  • Soft Keyboard Input Mode doesn't work on .NET MAUI Blazor 8.0.3 (Android) #19066

PullRequests

Created

  • Save device logs when UI Tests fail #19085
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Revert "[Blazor] Fix static file handling so that it special cases modules.json (main)" #19079
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • [tests] Fix WebView leak test #19076
    area/controls 🎮
  • [Windows] Fix setting flyout width (#19068) #19070
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨

Merged

  • [ios] update MemoryAnalyzers and cleanup #18449
    platform/iOS 🍎, t/housekeeping ♻︎, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 SR1
  • Add nightly to the list of versions #19088
  • Prevent iOS CollectionView size shifts from clearing the cell size cache #19069
    area/collectionview 📃
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19067
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [testing] Run tests on device #17808
    area/testing

Updated

  • Fix for #11991 - CollectionView SelectedItem BackgroundColor is always Gray on iOS #17464
    area/collectionview 📃, community ✨, stale, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Avoid possible crash using essentials Battery #18386
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/essentials 🍞
  • Add Android 14.0 or API 34 to the test matrix #18721
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Update ShellSectionRenderer.cs #18945
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • [Android] Correctly clear text tapping the clear button on Entry #17543
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, Under Consideration
  • Fix for button cornerradius 0 on android #18959
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • [tests] Add runs on iOS17 #18962
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, .NET 8 SR1
  • Improves performance on BindableProperty #17756
    area/Xaml </>, community ✨, stale, Under Consideration
  • Add benchmarking class for PropertyMapper extensions #18660

    area/layout 🔲
  • Added TimePicker TimeSelected Event #18565
    do-not-merge, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-datetimepicker
  • Allow GesturePlatformManager to be created for views with null window… #18938
    community ✨, area/gestures
  • Disallow `NaN`s in `Rect` sizes #18971

  • iOS Keyboard Scrolling Improvements and UITests (not from fork) #17670

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Align Execute...-methods with single-statement SaveChanges behaviour regarding transactions #32443
  • Exception thrown when using IEnumberable<T>.First() inside of IEnumberable<T>.Contains() and IQueryable<T>.Where() #32442
  • Vulnerable package with Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.SqlServer 8.0.0 #32441
  • Busting stale data in DB entities (L1 cache and other sheningans) #32438
  • ComplexType.get_ConstructorBinding throws InvalidCastException trying to cast to IReadOnlyEntityType #32437
  • DBContext.Database.SqlQuery<string>(sql) get a wrong result #32435
  • Incorrect parameter rewriting for string StartsWith/EndsWith/Contains #32432
  • "Index was out of range" in ShaperProcessingExpressionVisitor.JsonEntityMaterializerRewriter #32431
  • Property conversions are lost on base type is subtype is registered to model afterwards after upgrade to EFCore 8 #32430
  • Query root of type 'TemporalAsOfQueryRootExpression' wasn't handled by provider code. This issue happens when using a provider specific method on a different provider where it is not supported. #32428

Closed

  • After upgrading to .NET 8, OrderBy(x => x.StringProperty.StartsWith(query)) in a LINQ to SQL tree deletes results that do not StartWith(query). #32436
  • Translate Min/Max over inline collection via LEAST/GREATEST #32332
    9.0.0
  • Add EF.Parameter to force parameterization in query #28151
    9.0.0
  • Query with Contains and FirstOrDefault that worked in EF7 no longer works in EF8 #32423
  • Translate to GREATEST/LEAST in relational #31681
    9.0.0
  • SQL Server: Translate Math.Max/Min in non-aggregate context #27794
    9.0.0
  • TPC with tables that don't have a common PK? #32401

PullRequests

Created

  • Create correct JSON reader/writer for double nested value conversions #32444
  • [release/8.0] Add method postfix when rewriting parameters for StartsWith/EndsWith/Contains #32440
    Servicing-consider
  • Allow ignored key values for fixup before saving using TPT #32439
  • [release/8.0] Allow opting out of new subquery translation for Contains #32434
    Servicing-consider

Merged

  • Add method postfix when rewriting parameters for StartsWith/EndsWith/Contains #32433
  • Implement EF.Parameter #32427
  • Remove no-longer-needed unwrapping of AsQueryable #32429
  • Work on LEAST/GREATEST, Math.Min/Max #32338

Updated

  • Fix to #27844 - EF Core 6.0 temporal table migration when altering computed column not generating correct script #32398
  • Test new sqlite3mc SQLitePCLRaw bundle #32369

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Update Installer CI to Fedora 39 #17888
  • The Release Notes link is invalid on the .NET 9.0 SDK installation wizard. #17874

Closed

  • The .NET 8 SDK installer recommends Visual Studio 17.7 when it should recommend 17.8 #17770
  • Cannot get the latest .Net 9.0 SDK build from the Table, downloaded version doesn't match the display version. #17814

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #17882

Merged

  • Revert "Disable crossgen and zip file creation in the local dev build unless -pack is used" #17873
  • Revert "Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx'" #17871
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #17851

Updated

  • Update to Fedora 39 #17840
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #17870
